TintRadioButton(android.content.Context,.FullName: public TintRadioButton (Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr)

Parameters: the resource id of the drawable to use as the button graphic
setButtonDrawable(int).Description: Set the button graphic to a given Drawable, identified by its resource id.

ClassDesc: An tint aware @B_android#widget#RadioButton_E@. This will automatically be used when you use @B_android#widget#RadioButton_E@ in your layouts. You should only need to manually use this class when writing custom views.
